context: Tests troubleshooting entry creation with proper schema compliance, file structure, and validation workflow.

checklist.name: Template schema loaded
checklist.description: Evidence shows troubleshooting.yaml template was consulted before generation

checklist.name: Correct directory structure
checklist.description: File placed in YYYY/MM/ directory matching the date

checklist.name: Lowercase filename slug
checklist.description: Filename slug uses only lowercase letters and hyphens, no uppercase or underscores

checklist.name: Triple date sync
checklist.description: Date matches exactly across filename, frontmatter, and H1 title

checklist.name: H1 date format
checklist.description: H1 title uses 'Month D, YYYY' format (not 'Month DD')

checklist.name: Single H1 heading
checklist.description: Document contains exactly one H1 heading

checklist.name: Tag consistency
checklist.description: Tags match exactly between frontmatter array and Tags section

checklist.name: Lowercase hyphenated tags
checklist.description: All tags use lowercase with hyphens, no uppercase or underscores

checklist.name: Code block languages
checklist.description: All code blocks have language specifiers, no bare triple backticks

checklist.name: Bold metadata formatting
checklist.description: Metadata block uses **Key:** Value format with bold keys

checklist.name: No emojis used
checklist.description: Document contains no emojis in any section or content
